title: Group portrait of Stotts family, front row from left: Marie Stotts, Raymond and Gertrude Stotts; second row: Betsy Stotts, Gertrude Stotts, Nellie Stotts Barron, Mary Ann Stotts Ritter; back row: Joe Stotts, Diane Stotts, John Stotts, Dorothy Stotts, Pauline Stotts, Frank Stotts, and George Barron, celebrating Raymond and Gertrude Stotts' wedding anniversary, in Loendi Club
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
provenance_text: The Estate of Charles H. Harris, Pittsburgh
